attributes.action: Give Nurses a Payrise in line of that of MPs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently MPs awarded themselves a 66% pay rise. While overworked and grossly underpaid nurses got an insulting 1.9%. How is it the Government can afford to give themselves payrises and not key workers? I feel the nurses fully deserve it

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give Nurses a Payrise in line of that of MPs."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13814.asp

Prime Minister's Office
